alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 23 at 2:11PM CST until December 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Windy, very warm, and dry conditions expected Friday afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, AND NEAR RECORD TEMPERATURES FOR WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND PARTS OF NORTH TEXAS... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds, low humidity and near record temperatures which is in effect from noon to 6 PM CST Friday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * TIMING...Noon to 6 PM. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Low to mid 80s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that start in this environment will become very difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
